testimonials.text: Cole Tree Care is absolutely the company you want to hire for any of your tree care and stump grinding needs. These guys positively crushed the job and transformed my yard quickly. In additional to clearing and grinding the rhizomes of this invasive bamboo, they ground down an additional 11 shrubs and tree stumps for us. They went above and beyond to clean up my yard as if it were their own. What a makeover. Don’t just go with the first results on google when you’re looking for tree care and stump grinding in the Richmond Hill area, Cole Tree Care is the company you want to call.

Amazing work and quick! They showed up during a rain storm, waited it out and took out the trees, and then came out the next day to finish the job on a windy day. They were very careful to avoid damaging anything while taking down large trees, and hauled everything away. Will refer all friends to this company. Affordable and quick, thank you so much!

I saw Josh came highly recommended on Facebook so gave him a call. He was quick to respond, had a competitive rate, and far exceeded our expectations. He even cleaned up a few other areas of the property that weren't on his list. He cleaned up everything including debris left by another company months ago. We will most definitely use him for future jobs. Thank you for your professionalism!
Hands down the best tree service company in town. The owner Josh is a great guy. Very communicative, friendly, goes above and beyond for us and offers the best quality work.

services.title: Removals
services.description: Professional tree removal services for trees of all sizes. We handle everything from small ornamental trees to large, hazardous trees safely and efficiently.

services.title: Trimming
services.description: Expert tree trimming and pruning services to maintain the health and appearance of your trees. We ensure proper growth patterns and remove dead or dangerous branches.

services.title: Stumps
services.description: Complete stump removal and grinding services. We eliminate unsightly stumps and prepare your property for new landscaping or construction.

about.title: About Cole Tree Care
about.description: At Cole Tree Care, we are your trusted partner for all tree removal and emergency tree services. With 25 years of experience in the industry, our certified arborists and skilled crew members are committed to providing safe, efficient, and professional tree care services. We understand that tree removal can be a complex and potentially dangerous task, which is why we prioritize safety above all else. Our team is fully insured, bonded, and equipped with state-of-the-art equipment to handle any tree removal challenge. Whether you need routine tree removal, emergency storm damage response, or stump grinding services, we approach every project with the same level of professionalism and attention to detail. We take pride in leaving your property cleaner than we found it, and our commitment to customer satisfaction has made us the preferred choice for residential, commercial, and municipal clients throughout the region. When you choose Cole Tree Care, you're choosing a team that values your safety, your property, and your peace of mind.

hero.title: Cole Tree Care
hero.subtitle: Richmond Hill's trusted and reliable tree professionals

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: Need tree removal services? Contact us today for a free estimate.
